summary: Interior design project management system called 'Shop List' - a production-ready ERP/BI SaaS for interior designers and architects to manage projects, clients, shopping lists, budgets, and workflows in one integrated platform
architectural_notes: Backend: Python 3.11 + FastAPI + SQLAlchemy + Alembic + PostgreSQL + Celery + Redis
Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite + TailwindCSS + Axios + Chart.js
Clean layered architecture: routers, services, repositories, models, schemas
Docker-based deployment with docker-compose (backend, frontend, postgres, redis containers)
JWT authentication with role-based access control
PDF generation using ReportLab or WeasyPrint
Multi-tenant SaaS foundation with low operational overhead
Normalized database schema with foreign keys, indexes, and soft deletes

existing_features.title: Build project dashboard displaying comprehensive project overview including client data, timeline, budget status, room breakdown, and material specifications
Create shopping list interface with product cards showing image, name, price, shop, link, quantity, status, and category with ability to add, edit, and remove items
Implement room management interface where rooms can be added to projects, edited, and have products and costs assigned to them with per-room budget display

Build budget overview page with automatic calculations showing total project cost, per-room breakdown, per-category breakdown (furniture, lighting, materials, appliances, decorations), and visual indicators for budget overages
Create task management interface displaying project tasks with deadlines, statuses, and notes, allowing users to add, update status, and complete tasks
Implement client portal view with read-only access to shared project elements where clients can view moodboards, product lists, budget summaries, and leave comments without editing
Build moodboard creation and viewing interface where users can assemble inspiration boards with items linked to actual shopping list products, showing real-time budget impact

Create logistics tracking view showing product order status pipeline from planned through ordered, in transit, delivered, to installed with ability to update status and view which items need attention
Implement client management interface for CRM module with list of clients, detail view showing contact information, project associations, contact history, and notes
Build product library interface for managing reusable products where users can add frequently used items with all details and quickly copy them to project shopping lists
Create authentication pages for registration and login with form validation and error handling
Implement project list view showing all projects with key information (name, client, budget status, deadline) and ability to create new projects and navigate to project details
Design a minimalist, professional visual theme with neutral colors, clean typography, and consistent spacing that works for desktop and mobile, avoiding blue and purple unless specified
